title: Nice, Not Nice
subtle: Concept (fiction), 36 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Can something be both nice and not nice? Nice, Not Nice is a creative book that shows students how context can determine whether something is nice or not. Engaging illustrations highlight the difference. The high-frequency words and repetitive text will support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to compare and contrast information and to connect to prior knowledge in order to better understand the text.
